text: 7.7 Mat 19.12, Apo 26.29, 1 Ko 12.11 Yad anɨgɨl gos nepin, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨli yad yokɨp mɨdebin tek yenɨgel. Anɨgɨl gos nepin ak pen, God gos ne ke nɨgup tek, binɨb okok kɨlop kɨles keke ñub. Binɨb ogɨnap kɨles tep olap ñek, adek ogɨnap ke gɨpal, binɨb ogɨnap kɨles tep olap ke ñek, adek ogɨnap ke gɨpal.
